alert.note: Alert for North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:21PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Itasca and northern Cass Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 421 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ball Club, to 6 miles southwest of Bemidji, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Deer River and Ball Club around 425 PM CDT. Zemple around 430 PM CDT. Days High Landing around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cohasset, Pokegama Lake and Pokegama Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca
